about_the_game:
In this Festive Content Pack you will find new Costumes for the Soldier, Wizard, Dragon, Shifter, and Rogue. A New Winter-Themed Map, "The Frost Chambers" will also be available to play in VS Mode and the Arcade Mode.

Included Costumes:
Soldier - Gingerbread Man [Festive Costume]
Wizard - Workshop Elf [Festive Costume]
Dragon - Reindeer [Festive Costume]
Shifter - Naughty & Nice [Festive Costume]
Rogue - Mr.Claus [Festive Costume]


Included Stages:
The Frost Chambers: Close Quarters Ice Dungeon with Frozen Orbs that will bounce around the map to create a new hazardous environment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
